Name: Especie
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist .
Review: Rum-laced and rust coloured with hints of clove and jasmine. A herbal aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Juraj Ivan at Coq D'Argent in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Especie contains 167 calories
